# Lawn bowls at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games

The lawn bowls competition at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games took place in Perth, Western Australia, from 19 November until 1 December 1962. The bowls competition started several days before the official opening of the Commonwealth Games.
The competition took place at the Dalkeith Bowling Club on the 'Paratai Drive' (Jutland Parade).
